General.Name: Beeks Trading Corporation Ltd
General.Description: Beeks Financial Cloud Group plc provides managed cloud computing, connectivity, and analytics services for capital markets and financial services sectors in the United Kingdom and internationally. The company offers on-demand computing solutions, including dedicated and virtual private servers; managed cloud solutions comprising private, proximity, exchange, hybrid, and public cloud solutions; and analytics solutions, such as mdPlay, Analytics as a Service, and stream2Cloud products. It also provides trading infrastructure solutions, including colocation, exchange and execution, and microwave and PTP solutions; and connectivity solutions, such as wide area networks, private networks, and cross connects. In addition, the company offers open finance and security solutions. Its cloud-based Infrastructure-as-a-Service (IaaS) model allows financial organizations to deploy and connect to exchanges, trading venues, and cloud service providers. The company was founded in 2011 and is based in Renfrew, the United Kingdom.
General.Address: Riverside Building, Renfrew, United Kingdom, PA4 8YU
